puppeteer.name: puppeteer
puppeteer.title: Puppeteer
puppeteer.desc: Master of strings and manipulation. Don't get too close to him, or he will turn you into one of his puppets.

harlequin.name: harlequin
harlequin.title: Harlequin
harlequin.desc: He may seems joyful, but he is filled with ill content. His laughter brings madness to men.

plague_doctor.name: plague_doctor
plague_doctor.title: Plague doctor
plague_doctor.desc: Once doctor helping the sick, now a shadow of their former selves.
